goal: Build a full-stack web application with frontend, backend, auth, security review, CI/CD, and integration

steps.task: Create backend API: (1) Express + TypeScript server, (2) JWT authentication with register/login/logout, (3) CRUD endpoints for the main resource, (4) Input validation and sanitization, (5) CORS configured for frontend origin, (6) Clear API documentation in code comments.

Build frontend: (1) React + TypeScript with Vite, (2) Auth pages (login/register), (3) Main CRUD interface, (4) API integration via fetch (not local-only state), (5) Loading and error states, (6) Vite proxy for /api routes.
Write comprehensive tests: (1) Backend unit + integration tests, (2) Frontend component tests, (3) Auth flow integration test, (4) All tests pass.

Security review: (1) Check for injection vulnerabilities, (2) Review JWT implementation, (3) Check dependency vulnerabilities with npm audit, (4) Review CORS configuration, (5) Document findings and fixes.
CI/CD and deployment: (1) GitHub Actions workflow for lint + test + build, (2) Dockerfile for production, (3) docker-compose.yml for local development, (4) Environment variable documentation.

Final integration: (1) Verify full end-to-end flow (register, login, CRUD), (2) Fix any field name mismatches, (3) Ensure all tests pass after security fixes, (4) Write comprehensive README, (5) Add Troubleshooting section.
